pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick colors from the palette and assign on 3D view

content.raw:
I got another crash :/ This happens when I add follow the same steps as above, but add stairs in the first building. It seems to crash soon after starting the building editor the second time.

Backtrace, not sure if this is helpful:

```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff5d377a9 in QGraphicsItemPrivate::setVisibleHelper(bool, bool, bool)
    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff5d377a9 in QGraphicsItemPrivate::setVisibleHelper(bool, bool, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#1  0x00007ffff6b4c9b8 in gazebo::gui::EditorView::leaveEvent (this=0x383d100)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/building/EditorView.cc:525
#2  0x00007ffff57d6197 in QWidget::event(QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#3  0x00007ffff5b77fce in QFrame::event(QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#4  0x00007ffff5bf442b in QAbstractScrollArea::event(QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#5  0x00007ffff5786e2c in QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper(QObject*, QEvent*)
    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#6  0x00007ffff578d4a0 in QApplication::notify(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#7  0x00007ffff52554dd in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal(QObject*, QEvent*)
    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#8  0x00007ffff578c395 in QApplicationPrivate::dispatchEnterLeave(QWidget*, QWidget*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#9  0x00007ffff578cd49 in QApplicationPrivate::sendMouseEvent(QWidget*, QMouseEvent*, QWidget*, QWidget*, QWidget**, QPointer<QWidget>&, bool) ()
```
